params.coinAmount: BURNIE amount to credit (minted via vaultEscrow beforehand).
params.rngWord: VRF entropy for bond jackpot resolution (0 if not applicable).
params.stEthAmount: stETH amount to transfer from game to bonds.

params.stopAt: Maximum bondPool value to consider (optimization hint).

returns.required: ETH needed to cover next maturity obligations.

returns._0: Target percentage of stakeable funds to hold as stETH (0-10000).

notifyGameOver().notice: Signal game-over to bonds, enabling shutdown resolution flow.

payBonds(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Send ETH/stETH/BURNIE to bonds for jackpot funding or vault sweep.

requiredCoverNext(uint256).notice: Query the ETH cover required for upcoming bond maturities.

rewardStakeTargetBps().notice: Get the admin-configured target ratio for stETH staking (basis points).
